ValidationRule.description: Submitted to Customer Date cannot be greater than Today.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile",NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin)), CQ_Submitted_to_Customer_Date__c > Today(), Quote_Type__c = 'CQ' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Submitted to Customer Date cannot be in the future.
